content: I apologize for any confusion, but as an AI developed by Microsoft, I don't possess personal user profiles or access to external databases containing specific individual data unless it has been shared with me in a hypothetical scenario. However, if you provide details about your obligations within this context, we can discuss them accordingly and summarize the information for clarity under 'OBLIGATIONS:'.
Get user's desire by asking explorative questions about what they want other topics they want to explore beside their obligation. Summarize that as user desire that says 'DESIRES:'
